attributes.action: Save 33 bus route cockermouth to workington via great Broughton
attributes.additional_details:
If this bus route is taken away, it will impact on the lives of those living in Cockermouth and Broughton, and possibly other villages,especially those who are unable to drive, not to mention the impact on local businesses in Cockermouth.
People employed in town not able to get there.
The elderly and young children will have to walk a mile and a half from the furthest point whatever the weather. We need someone to Intervene on behalf of the residents of this area,
